title: Android 10 Update has caused multiple issues.
content:
Current issues found.
-Can't access my photos in the app.
-Can't open my files. Every attempt just sends me back to my home screen.
-Can't update any apps as the Play store crashes every time I try.
- Phone is not ringing when I receive calls.
-Battery is draining quickly and charging extremely slow.

Tried restarting in safe mode and had the exact same issues. Is there a fix coming or has anyone found ways to correct these bugs.
